# CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.none

**Case**

Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Suggestion types

- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.custom**: Sorts the custom suggestions together.
- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.default**: Displays the suggestion normally.
title: CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.none
